snippet.title: ARC VS. Super Mario Bros.
snippet.description:
Support Shiryu on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Shiryu
https://www.facebook.com/ShiryuVideoGames/
https://www.facebook.com/ShiryuMusic/

Nintendo is re-releasing for the very first time their range of arcade games. Hamster is adding to their successful Arcade Archives library several Nintendo produced titles for Arcade salons exclusively on the Nintendo Switch. Much like their Neo Geo re-releases all games include several options to better accommodate the Switch unique style and multiplayer capabilities.

"VS. Super Mario Bros." will be released at the Nintendo Switch eShop on December 22, 2017.

PLEASE NOTE: This gameplay footage is capture on the latest stable build of MAME on Windows. The core game experience is exactly the same.

Play hard, PLAY LOUD! ᕦ(ò_óˇ)ᕤ
